remarks: The topology induced by a uniform structure generated by a metric ` D ` is that metric's open sets.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Dec-2017.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: metutopOLD $p |- ( ( X =/= (/) /\ D e. ( *Met ` X ) ) -> ( unifTop ` ( metUnifOLD ` D ) ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) $.
